description.zh-cn: 元末民变领袖之一，白莲教教主。被刘福通等人奉立为帝，国号“宋”，年号“龙凤”。后被朱元璋救出并控制，最终在渡江时因船难溺亡，死因存疑。
description.en: A leader of the Red Turban Rebellion at the end of the Yuan dynasty and a leader of the White Lotus society. He was installed as Emperor of the restored Song dynasty by Liu Futong and others. He was later rescued and controlled by Zhu Yuanzhang, and eventually drowned in a shipwreck while crossing the Yangtze River under suspicious circumstances.

description.zh-cn: 元末民变领袖，白莲教教主，韩林儿之父。他自称宋徽宗八世孙，利用弥勒佛下凡的号召组织起义，事败被杀。
description.en: A leader of the Red Turban Rebellion at the end of the Yuan dynasty, leader of the White Lotus society, and the father of Han Lin'er. He claimed to be a descendant of Emperor Huizong of Song and organized an uprising under the banner of Maitreya's descent, but was killed after the plot was discovered.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国皇帝。在元末民变中崛起，曾救出韩林儿并将其置于控制之下，后被广泛怀疑派人谋杀了韩林儿。
description.en: Founding emperor of the Ming dynasty. He rose to power during the Red Turban Rebellion, rescued Han Lin'er and placed him under his control, and is widely suspected of having him assassinated.

description.zh-cn: 元末红巾军主要领袖。在韩山童死后，他重新集结部众，拥立韩林儿为帝，建立“宋”政权。后在安丰保卫战中被张士诚部将吕珍所杀。
description.en: A major leader of the Red Turban Army during the late Yuan dynasty. After Han Shantong's death, he regrouped the forces and enthroned Han Lin'er as emperor, establishing the 'Song' regime. He was later killed by Lü Zhen, a general under Zhang Shicheng, during the defense of Anfeng.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋麾下将领。奉命迎接韩林儿前往应天府，途中韩林儿在瓜步渡江时溺亡，其角色存有争议。
description.en: A general under Zhu Yuanzhang. He was ordered to escort Han Lin'er to Yingtianfu. During the journey, Han Lin'er drowned at Guabu while crossing the river; Liao's role in the incident is controversial.

description.zh-cn: 元末群雄之一，朱元璋的竞争对手。曾派部将吕珍围攻韩林儿所在的安丰。
description.en: One of the warlords during the late Yuan dynasty and a rival of Zhu Yuanzhang. He sent his general Lü Zhen to besiege Anfeng, where Han Lin'er was located.

description.zh-cn: 张士诚麾下将领。奉命围攻安丰，并在此战中杀死了刘福通。
description.en: A general under Zhang Shicheng. He was ordered to besiege Anfeng and killed Liu Futong in the battle.

description.zh-cn: 元朝末年重要将领，曾率军反攻红巾军，于1359年攻破汴梁，迫使韩林儿逃亡。
description.en: An important general of the late Yuan dynasty. He led counter-offensives against the Red Turban Army, captured Bianliang in 1359, forcing Han Lin'er to flee.

description.zh-cn: 韩山童之妻，韩林儿之母。韩林儿称帝后，被尊为皇太后。
description.en: The wife of Han Shantong and mother of Han Lin'er. After Han Lin'er became emperor, she was honored as the Empress Dowager.

description.zh-cn: 元朝地方政府的行政人员的泛称。
description.en: A general term for the administrative personnel of the local governments of the Yuan Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 在中国历史上存在已久的民间宗教团体，在元末组织了大规模的农民起义。
description.en: A folk religious group with a long history in China, which organized a large-scale peasant uprising at the end of the Yuan Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 元末民变期间，由刘福通等人拥立韩林儿建立的政权，国号宋，年号龙凤，又称“韩宋”。
description.en: A regime established by Liu Futong and others during the Red Turban Rebellion, with Han Lin'er as its emperor. Its state name was Song and its era name was Longfeng; it is also known as 'Han Song'.

description.zh-cn: 元末民变中的主要起义军队，因头裹红巾而得名。韩林儿的宋政权是其主要政治核心之一。
description.en: The main rebel army in the late Yuan dynasty rebellions, named for the red turbans they wore. Han Lin'er's Song regime was one of its main political centers.

description.zh-cn: 元朝末年发生的大规模农民起义，最终导致元朝灭亡和明朝建立。
description.en: A series of large-scale peasant uprisings in the late Yuan dynasty, which ultimately led to the fall of the Yuan and the establishment of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 导致韩林儿在瓜步渡长江时溺亡的事件。
description.en: The incident that caused Han Lin'er to drown while crossing the Yangtze River at Guabu.

description.zh-cn: 韩林儿是韩山童的儿子。
description.en: Han Lin'er is the son of Han Shantong.

description.zh-cn: 韩林儿是杨氏的儿子。
description.en: Han Lin'er is the son of Lady Yang.

description.zh-cn: 韩山童与杨氏是夫妻关系。
description.en: Han Shantong and Lady Yang were husband and wife.

description.zh-cn: 韩山童与刘福通等人在颍州召集河工发动起义。
description.en: Han Shantong, Liu Futong, and others gathered river workers in Yingzhou to launch an uprising.

description.zh-cn: 韩山童的起义计划被当地官吏察觉，导致其被捕杀。
description.en: Han Shantong's rebellion plan was discovered by local officials, leading to his capture and execution.

description.zh-cn: 在韩山童死后，刘福通再次发动起义，并拥立韩林儿为帝。
description.en: After Han Shantong's death, Liu Futong launched another uprising and installed Han Lin'er as emperor.

description.zh-cn: 刘福通拥立韩林儿为帝，建立国号为“宋”的政权。
description.en: Liu Futong installed Han Lin'er as emperor, establishing a regime with the state name 'Song'.

description.zh-cn: 韩林儿被拥立为宋政权的皇帝，称号“小明王”，年号“龙凤”。
description.en: Han Lin'er was installed as the emperor of the Song regime, with the title 'Lesser King of Light' and the era name 'Longfeng'.

description.zh-cn: 刘福通拥立韩林儿为帝后，作为其麾下最重要的军事领袖。
description.en: After installing Han Lin'er as emperor, Liu Futong served as his most important military leader.

description.zh-cn: 韩林儿的宋政权是红巾军的一支主要力量，其军队被称为红巾军。
description.en: The Song regime of Han Lin'er was a major force within the Red Turban movement, and its army was known as the Red Turban Army.

description.zh-cn: 作为元朝将领，察罕帖木儿率军反攻韩林儿的红巾军。
description.en: As a Yuan dynasty general, Chaghan Temur led forces to counter-attack Han Lin'er's Red Turban Army.

description.zh-cn: 察罕帖木儿攻破宋政权的首都汴梁，迫使韩林儿逃往安丰。
description.en: Chaghan Temur captured Bianliang, the capital of the Song regime, forcing Han Lin'er to flee to Anfeng.

description.zh-cn: 吕珍是张士诚的部将，奉命围攻安丰。
description.en: Lü Zhen was a general under Zhang Shicheng, ordered to besiege Anfeng.

description.zh-cn: 吕珍在围攻安丰时，杀死了前来救援的刘福通。
description.en: During the siege of Anfeng, Lü Zhen killed Liu Futong who was leading a relief force.

description.zh-cn: 张士诚派部将吕珍围攻韩林儿所在的安丰，导致刘福通战死。
description.en: Zhang Shicheng sent his general Lü Zhen to besiege Anfeng where Han Lin'er was located, leading to the death of Liu Futong.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋从张士诚部将吕珍的围攻中救出韩林儿。
description.en: Zhu Yuanzhang rescued Han Lin'er from the siege by Lü Zhen, a general under Zhang Shicheng.

description.zh-cn: 获救后，韩林儿被朱元璋安置在滁州，实际上处于其控制之下，成为其“挟天子以令诸侯”的政治工具。
description.en: After being rescued, Han Lin'er was settled in Chuzhou by Zhu Yuanzhang and was effectively under his control, serving as a political figurehead.

description.zh-cn: 据史书记载，韩林儿之死有可能是朱元璋派人谋杀。朱元璋派廖永忠迎接韩林儿，途中船覆溺亡。
description.en: According to historical records, it is suspected that Han Lin'er was assassinated by Zhu Yuanzhang. Zhu sent Liao Yongzhong to escort Han Lin'er, during which the boat capsized and he drowned.

description.zh-cn: 廖永忠是朱元璋麾下的将领。
description.en: Liao Yongzhong was a general under Zhu Yuanzhang's command.

description.zh-cn: 廖永忠奉命迎接韩林儿，途中韩林儿在瓜步渡江时船覆溺亡，廖永忠被认为是直接责任人。
description.en: Liao Yongzhong was ordered to escort Han Lin'er. During the journey at Guabu, Han Lin'er's boat capsized and he drowned. Liao Yongzhong is considered to be directly responsible for his death.

description.zh-cn: 韩林儿在渡过长江时因船难而溺亡。
description.en: Han Lin'er drowned in a shipwreck while crossing the Yangtze River.

description.zh-cn: 韩林儿是河北栾城人。
description.en: Han Lin'er was from Luancheng, Hebei.
